thread.title: BRIEF-Leagold And Brio Gold Agree To Friendly Acquisition

title: BRIEF-Leagold And Brio Gold Agree To Friendly Acquisition
text: 10 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Leagold And Brio Gold Agree To Friendly Acquisition Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Brio Gold Inc: * LEAGOLD AND BRIO GOLD AGREE TO A FRIENDLY ACQUISITION * LEAGOLD AND BRIO GOLD AGREE TO A FRIENDLY ACQUISITION * LEAGOLD MINING - PURSUANT TO DEFINITIVE ARRANGEMENT DEAL FOR EACH BRIO COMMON SHARE, CO TO ISSUE 0.922 OF CO SHARE, 0.4 OF CO SHARE PURCHASE WARRANT * LEAGOLD MINING - DEAL FOR TOTAL CONSIDERATION ABOUT $279 MILLION * LEAGOLD MINING - ANTICIPATES SIGNIFICANT COST SAVINGS THROUGH REDUCTION OF BRIOâ€˜S CORPORATE COSTS, SEES SAVINGS BETWEEN $8 MILLION - $10 MILLION PER YEAR * LEAGOLD MINING CORP - COMBINED ENTITY IS EXPECTED TO PRODUCE BETWEEN 420,000 AND 475,000 OZ OF GOLD IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
